natural solution: To round to the nearest hundredth, we must look at the thousandths place, which here is $9$. $9$ is greater than or equal to $5$, so the hundredths digit $0$ rounds up to $1$.
So, rounding $563.5097$ to the nearest hundredth yields $\boxed{563.51}.$
